Okay: Here's what I have to say:
It's a really good addition to the franchise. I enjoyed the new gels, the lasers are much much better than the Aperture Science High Energy Pellet, Wheatley is funny as hell, the end is totally unexpected. As for the co-op, it's fun, but I would've liked the originally planned competitive mode along side it. Even after the nearly 8 years I've played this game, and the nearly impossible Xbox 360 controls, it still holds all of it's charm. User generated content was Valve's most amazing idea, as it provides nearly endless content for their game. I would like a bit more added to the editor, such as logic gates, older items, themes, and more if they can. And maybe increase the item limit. Still. 10/10 game.

pootal 2

What an adventure it was! The characters in this game are incredibly silly, sarcastic and sometimes even adorable. The story was awesome from start to end and even the outro was iconic. Puzzles are challenging but not super hard, you will spend a good amount of time thinking about your strategy to finish each level. The AI/Robots are super well implemented in the game and the main NPC´s feel like real humans with a personality and humor. I wish the story would have been double as long as it is, because I had a blast playing it. I also played CO-OP with some of my friends and I would highly recommend doing that too! You need good coordination and teamwork to achieve your goal. It´s impossible to not have a good time while playing with friends, since the puzzles are very well planned for two people and it´s hilarious to see your partner fail while a sarcastic robot makes jokes about the two of you! Looking forward to try out the community-maps!

I highly recommend playing this game, it´s timeless and I definitely don´t regret playing it in 2020! One of my new All-Time-Favorites!

Portal 1'in devamı olan Portal 2 sürekli önümüze gelen bulmacaları çözdüğümüz, Steam Atölyesi ve Co-op desteği olan bir oyun. Hikaye ve oynanış anlamında gerçekten tatmin edici bir yapım. Oynamanızı tavsiye ederim.

сюжет

Valve'den bir bulmaca oyunu olan Portal 2 gerçekten muhteşem bir oyun. Aklınızın sınırlarını zorlamak istiyorsanız ve sıkıldıysanız bu oyun tam size göre. Oyunun içinde saatlerce beyin fırtınası yapmanızı sağlayacak bir sürü bölüm var. 
Hikayesinden dolayı bu oyunu oynamadan önce birinci oyunu alıp bitirmenizi öneririm. Arkadaşınızlada oynayabileceğiniz bu oyunda kendi bölümünü yaratmak ve diğer insanların yarattığı bölümleri oynamak da var. Grafikleri de güzel.
İndirimdeyken 2 TL'ye kadar düşebiliyor. Eğer ilk oyun sizde yoksa Portal Bundle'ı almanızı öneririm.
